author: Luis Cruz
subject: Re: OhayoCon Rocked My World - :)
body:
> Some lupin/jigen/car thing which I have no idea what the hell it does.

If it comes w/a gun, it is a remote control car that is activated via
sound.  The little gun makes it start/stop.  There is a red car and a
yellow car version.

---
"I have a To Do pile?!" - Homer Simpson

Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
